virtual int CommunicationProcessor::putInterfaceRequest (  InterfaceRequest *&  ireq  )  [virtual]
 

Put a InterfaceRequest to handle, put ready and new InterfaceRequests here.

Monitor method.

Parameters:
ireq The InterfaceRequest to handle, set to NULL if put into this else caller must handle it by making a minimal effort returning an "Server overloaded" error.
Returns:
Queue full number, the amount of irequests that are over the full limit.
